name: grp-14b
label: GRP-14b: FreeSurfer Longitudinal Report Aggregation
description: This Gear iterates over all results generated by the FreeSurfer Longtitudinal Processing Gear - GRP-14 - and aggregates those results across CSV files. This Gear is designed to be run at the Project Level.

name-of-gear.description: Search for CSV files in analysis results for this gear (note: you must use the gear name from the manifest, not the label).

version-of-gear.description: Search for CSV files in analysis results for this versioin of the gear.  If not specified, all versions will be searched.

analysis-regex.description: A regular expression to find analyses to include.  Default is all analyses for the given gear and version.

author: Flywheel
